title: Broken install on dev

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
The `phonemizer` from BootPhon doesn't install from the dev `setup.py` script:

```
josh@stealth:~/git/TTS$ virtualenv -p python3.7 venv-dev
Running virtualenv with interpreter /usr/bin/python3.7
Using base prefix '/usr'
/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/virtualenv.py:1086: DeprecationWarning: the imp module is deprecated in favour of importlib; see the module's documentation for alternative uses
  import imp
New python executable in /home/josh/git/TTS/venv-dev/bin/python3.7
Also creating executable in /home/josh/git/TTS/venv-dev/bin/python
Installing setuptools, pkg_resources, pip, wheel...done.
josh@stealth:~/git/TTS$ source venv-dev/bin/activate
(venv-dev) josh@stealth:~/git/TTS$ python --version
Python 3.7.4
(venv-dev) josh@stealth:~/git/TTS$ python setup.py develop
running develop
-- Building version 0.0.1+47c32ce
running egg_info
writing TTS.egg-info/PKG-INFO
writing dependency_links to TTS.egg-info/dependency_links.txt
writing requirements to TTS.egg-info/requires.txt
writing top-level names to TTS.egg-info/top_level.txt
package init file './__init__.py' not found (or not a regular file)
reading manifest file 'TTS.egg-info/SOURCES.txt'
writing manifest file 'TTS.egg-info/SOURCES.txt'
running build_ext
Creating /home/josh/git/TTS/venv-dev/lib/python3.7/site-packages/TTS.egg-link (link to .)
Adding TTS 0.0.1+47c32ce to easy-install.pth file

Installed /home/josh/git/TTS
Processing dependencies for TTS==0.0.1+47c32ce
Searching for phonemizer@ https://github.com/bootphon/phonemizer/tarball/master
Reading https://pypi.org/simple/phonemizer/
Couldn't find index page for 'phonemizer' (maybe misspelled?)
Scanning index of all packages (this may take a while)
Reading https://pypi.org/simple/
No local packages or working download links found for phonemizer@ https://github.com/bootphon/phonemizer/tarball/master
error: Could not find suitable distribution for Requirement.parse('phonemizer@ https://github.com/bootphon/phonemizer/tarball/master')
```

I took the old syntax from the `master` branch, and it worked fine, specifically:

```
    install_requires=[
        ...
        "phonemizer"
    ],
    dependency_links=[
        'http://github.com/bootphon/phonemizer/tarball/master#egg=phonemizer'
    ],
```
